name: Sage & Apple-stuffed Pork Chops
description: Pork is a great source of protein, vitamin B 12 and zinc – important for building strong, healthy bodies.
preparation: Add butter and apple to frying pan and sauté over medium-high heat until apple is soft and browned. Add Sage & Apple Stuffing Seasoning, bread, Black Pepper, and Nourish Bouillon. Heat thoroughly.
Slice each pork chop along one side to create a pocket. Stuff bread mixture into pocket.
Return pan to stove; add oil and sear pork chops on both sides for 3–5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook for an additional 5–8 minutes.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with steamed Brussels sprouts and mashed potatoes.
